definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The complex surface matching and machining allowance solving have been done.
sentences.chinese: 葉片曲面的匹配及加工餘量的計算。

sentences.english: Respectively lase both sides of the stern tube in order to measure the boring dimensions roughly.
sentences.chinese: 在艉軸管前後分別用激光粗打鏜孔餘量的分佈情況。

sentences.english: This paper puts its emphasis on introducing the computer calculation of allowance.
sentences.chinese: 重點介紹加工餘量的計算機算法。

sentences.english: For instance, when using flat-bottomed cutter to process curved surface, negative margin cannot be offered.
sentences.chinese: 如在使用平底刀做曲面加工時，不能給負餘量。

sentences.english: The pipe should be dimensioned with adequate capacity for future expansion.
sentences.chinese: 管道尺寸應爲今後擴容留足餘量。

sentences.english: Increasing the head-room of a transistor power amplifier is a way to improve the tone quality.
sentences.chinese: 提高晶體管功放動態餘量，是改善其音質的良好途徑。
